mapper.select: SELECT tbcmt.id ,tbcmt.tbboard_id ,tbcmt.content ,tbcmt.deleted ,tbcmt.created_at ,tbcmt.modified_at FROM tbcmt WHERE tbcmt.id = #{id}

SELECT tbcmt.id ,tbcmt.tbboard_id ,tbcmt.content ,tbcmt.deleted ,tbcmt.created_at ,tbcmt.modified_at FROM tbcmt WHERE tbcmt.id is not null AND tbcmt.tbboard_id = #{tbboard_id} AND tbcmt.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND tbcmt.deleted = #{deleted} ORDER BY tbcmt.created_at DESC

SELECT tbcmt.id ,tbcmt.tbboard_id ,tbcmt.content ,tbcmt.deleted ,tbcmt.created_at ,tbcmt.modified_at FROM tbcmt WHERE tbcmt.id is not null AND tbcmt.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbcmt.created_at AND tbcmt.tbboard_id = #{tbboard_id} AND tbcmt.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND tbcmt.deleted = #{deleted} ORDER BY tbcmt.created_at ORDER BY tbcmt.tbboard_id ASC DESC LIMIT #{callpage}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(tbcmt.id) as listsize FROM tbcmt WHERE tbcmt.id is not null AND tbcmt.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbcmt.created_at AND tbcmt.tbboard_id = #{tbboard_id} AND tbcmt.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND tbcmt.deleted = #{deleted}
